Incorporate these elements: - **Learning Objectives** (span Bloom's Taxonomy): [insert full learning_objectives array here] - **Active Learning** for context: [insert active_learning_components summary] - **Scaffolding Layers**: Ensure coverage: [insert scaffolding_layers summary] - **Content Completeness**: Include definitions, how it occurs (verbose errors, input validation), examples (PHP: 'Warning: include(/var/www/html/admin/config.php)'), detection (Burp Suite, trigger errors), impacts (sensitive data access, LFI aid, priv esc), mitigations (custom errors, disable verbose). Follow this **Flashcard Schema** strictly: [insert flashcard_generation_schema here]. Output ONLY a JSON array of 25 flashcards, each as an object: {"id":1, "type":"basic/mcq/cloze", "bloom_level":"Remember", "scaffolding_layer":1, "front":"...", "back":"...", "explanation":"...", "distractors":["..."] if MCQ}.
